title: BSoD Problem
body: So, this is a reoccurring problem for me. I keep getting the Blue Screen of Death, mostly while playing league. There's stopcodes when it happens. I remember these codes CRITICAL_PROCESS_DIED and UNEXPECTED_STORAGE_EXCEPTION. Can anyone help? I don't want to get remaked again for crashing :(

replies.body: This sounds like some pretty serious hardware failure, but we can take a closer look.  If possible at all,  download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs then attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  This will go to our tech team who can dig deeper and help find some options best for you.  See you there!
